items.title: Social media trounces old media gatekeepers as news source for gory Charlie Kirk assassination video
items.description: Video was easy to find on X, TikTok, YouTube — even on Truth Social, where President Trump posted official word of the conservative activist's death.

items.title: Oracle’s blockbuster earnings swell Larry Ellison’s fortune by $100 billion in 30 minutes to put him neck and neck with Elon Musk
items.description: Only $1 billion separates the two richest men in the world after a wild day of trading.

items.title: Keir Starmer fires ‘Prince of Darkness’ Peter Mandelson, ambassador to U.S., over fresh revelations of Epstein links
items.description: On Wednesday, The Sun published emails that it said showed Mandelson telling Epstein to “fight for early release," adding "I think the world of you."

items.title: Texas A&M fires English professor over children’s literature course that critics called ‘DEI and LGBTQ indoctrination’
items.description: The professor's lawyer said she had "taught this course and others like it for many years, successfully and without challenge.”

items.title: Changing face of America revealed by Census Bureau: White population dips to 56.3%, numbers of non-married grow
items.description: The United States became more demographically diverse from 2023 to 2024.
